items.title: Travelers Companies (NYSE:TRV) Launches Synergy Product Liability Coverage for Life Sciences Sector
items.description: Travelers Companies (NYSE:TRV) recently unveiled Travelers Synergy, a new product liability coverage tailored for life sciences firms. This strategic enhancement, alongside the appointment of Mike Lawton as the new Chief Operating Officer of Travelers Europe, signifies the company's commitment to refining its market offerings and leadership team. Over the past month, Travelers' stock price rose 4.66%, despite a broader market decline with indexes like the Dow Jones and S&P 500 facing downward...
